```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
source("read.cnv.files.R")
```

## read cnv file:

```{r cars}
df <- read.cnv.file("example data/V0001F01.cnv")

head(df)
```

## Plot


```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
library("reshape2")
melted.df <- melt(df, id.vars = "depSM")

library("ggplot2")
ggplot(subset(melted.df, variable %in% c("c0mS.cm", "t090C", "sal00", "sbeox0ML.L")),
       aes(x = depSM, y = value)) +
    geom_point() +
    scale_x_reverse() +
    coord_flip() +
#    facet_grid(.~variable) +
    theme_bw()
```
